  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    BadInput
    Custom exception used to indicate invalid or malformed input by the player.
    CardNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a specified card cannot be found in a collection, such as a player's hand or the parade board.
    InvalidCardException
    Thrown when a player attempts to play a card that does not meet the game's conditions.
    MenuException
     
    SelectionException
    Exception thrown when an invalid or unsupported selection is made during a player's turn.
